data.lyric:
[ti:Fall]
[ar:易烊千玺]
[al:Fall]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Fall - 易烊千玺
[00:00.42]词：Jon Asher/Ryan Tutton/Dylan Bernard
[00:01.10]曲：Jon Asher/Ryan Tutton/Dylan Bernard
[00:01.78]中文词：Iris Judotter
[00:02.29]制作人：Kenn Wu/ Jochem Van Der Sag
[00:03.14]配唱制作人：Iris Judotter/Kenn Wu
[00:04.00]编曲：Jon Asher/Anwar Sawyer/Jochem Van Der Sag
[00:04.93]和声编写：Iris Judotter/Kenn Wu
[00:05.70]和声：Iris Judotter/易烊千玺/Dylan Bernard
[00:06.72]录音及剪辑工程师：刘韧/Jet Chong
[00:07.91]混音： Jochem Van Der Sag
[00:08.51]混音室：Blue Studios (Malibu)
[00:09.10]母带工程师：Daniel Rowland
[00:09.78]母带工作室：Rowland Studios (Hollywood)
[00:10.55]录音室：Tweak Tone Labs (Beijing) Oxygen Entertainment Production Facilities (Beijing) O Music Studio (Los Angeles) Blue Studios (Malibu)
[00:12.34]企划制作统筹：刘乃铭@流水纪
[00:13.46]You fall too hard too soft
[00:15.43]我无法感应
[00:16.82]We were meant to be lovers
[00:18.78]你是否相信
[00:19.91]Oh ya ya ya
[00:20.94]Want your touch
[00:21.83]Oh ya ya ya
[00:22.75]Need your love
[00:23.52]Oh ya ya ya
[00:24.43]Wind me up
[00:25.27]Oh ya ya ya ya
[00:26.70]I just want your heart and all your love now can you blame me
[00:30.10]不能控制夏天余留下的这份情绪
[00:33.31]Little things that u do
[00:36.50]Did they happen too soon
[00:41.24]你是我心深处的秘密
[00:44.77]一直环绕我所有思绪
[00:48.05]We talked all night
[00:50.01]Don't you remember
[00:51.22]I know you remember
[00:53.51]After the summer comes the fall
[00:56.83]We kept it going way too long
[01:00.29]I shoulda known to never let you in
[01:03.07]Now I can't break free
[01:04.82]Now I can't go back at all
[01:07.15]After the summer comes the fall
[01:10.63]季节变得太快
[01:11.82]而我 还不能习惯没你在左右
[01:16.82]你根本不懂
[01:18.46]I shoulda known better than to
[01:20.89]Shoulda known better than to fall
[01:22.40]想着你 等着你 我已快放弃
[01:25.33]炎热夏天一转眼它就快离去
[01:28.76]Oh ya ya ya
[01:29.49]Show me some
[01:30.22]Oh ya ya ya
[01:31.18]No one around
[01:32.01]Oh ya ya ya
[01:32.85]Let's get down

[01:38.64]不能控制夏天余留下的这份情绪
